item.title: Consideration
item.description: After some reflection, I do not think I’ll be doing any work soon that needs to run natively in Windows. I am more likely to target Linux and specifically Ubuntu. Therefore, WSL with VS Code is the natural ecosystem for my current work.

item.title: Bash on WSL in VS Code
item.description: When customizing the Bash environment in a “remote” session with WSL, it is important to remember that VS Code Remote does not treat the session as a login session.

item.title: Architecture
item.description: Robert Martin’s “Clean Architecture” has a startling proposal: that clean architecture is based on limiting the facilities available to developers to only what is necessary and good for building sound software.
